titles: Qvakers principles quaking, or, Pretended light proved darkness, and perfections found to be greatest imperfections in an answer to a written paper, subscribed with the name of Thomas Holme, and scattered through the country about Liverpool and Lancashire / modestly propounded by Ralph Hall ...
author: Hall, Ralph.
publisher: Printed by R.I. and are to be sold by Edm. Paxton ... and Tho. Parkhurst ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
keywords: Holme, Thomas. --  To the priests and people of Walton and Liverpool, and thereabouts.
Society of Friends --  England --  Controversial literature.
